named-query.name: findRelationByResource
named-query.query: select distinct m from ResourceLineAssignment m join m.child child join m.parent parent where child.id=? or parent.id=?

named-query.name: findAllResourceLineByUseraccount
named-query.query: select distinct m from ResourceLineAssignment m, IdentityResourceAuthorization a, RoleUserAuthorization b where m.child.id=a.resource.id and a.identity.id=b.role.id and b.user.userAccount=? and a.abolishDate>? and b.abolishDate>?

named-query.name: findAllResourceLine
named-query.query: select m from ResourceLineAssignment m where m.abolishDate>?
